group_1.textLeft: No matter how I look at it...
...There's nothing different about it@except that it's sprouting.

group_1.textRight: I can sense the same magic as the other@seeds within it, but that's not quite a clue...
I wonder why it's sprouting in the first place?

group_1.textLeft: Did you spot something?!

group_1.textRight: It's the hint...

group_1.narration: "As we all know, the Wado Kaichin is the first@of the Twelve Imperial Coins...."
"If you use that as an answer, it won't match@the others... Shouldn't it be Keicho Tsuho...?"

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300901:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]I don't know what you're talking about,@and this is no time to play around!

group_1.textRight: Fugyaaah! I'm sorry...!
There's a lot of hints related to history,@sooo I just...

group_1.textLeft: Geeze...
W-wait...! It's just as she says...
This hint is incorrect...!
As it is now, the riddle would be impossible@to solve and there would be no escape...

group_1.textRight: So, in the end, she saved Tsukuyo's class's@event...?

group_1.textLeft: That's nice and all...
But right now, this seed...
[chara:300901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
...Isn't the sprout shrinking...?
I-indeed...!

group_1.textRight: It shrank and turned back into a seed?!
We lost the clue because I did something@I shouldn't have...!
I'm sorry...! Here's my remorse pose...!

group_1.textLeft: But, thanks to you, we discovered that the hint was incorrect...!
Wait a minute...maybe it's the other way@around...

group_1.textRight: Hwah...?

group_1.textLeft: Other way around...?
Because Sayuki-senpai noticed that the hint@was wrong...
"Trouble solved," and it turned back into a seed?

group_1.textRight: Yeah!
Maybe because she "nipped the trouble in@the bud," it turned back into a seed?

group_1.textLeft: Is that supposed to be a gag...?
However, that really seems to be the case...

group_1.textRight: According to what we've heard,@the seeds could only be collected...
...after the trouble was resolved...
If we assume that they could be collected due@to reverting from a sprout back into a seed...
That would make a lot of sense...!
You have done well...!
H-hwaaah...? I did well...?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I'm sorry for snapping at you just now...

group_1.textRight: It's okaaay...it's true that I was doing@something selfish...

group_1.textCenter: ...What is the purpose of the culprit leading us@all the way here...?
...It appears reasonable to conclude that she@wanted to show us the seed that had sprouted...

group_1.textLeft: ...Is she teasing us, or misleading us?

group_1.textRight: Maybe she didn't expect us to turn it back into@a seed?

group_1.textLeft: Trying to show off her power, but accidentally@giving us information instead...
If that's the case, we can't let it go to waste.

select.textSelect: Let's crush as many troubles@as we can tonight!

group_4.textLeft: Trying to show off her power, but accidentally@giving us information instead...
If that's the case, we can't let it go to waste.

select.textSelect: Let's crush as many troubles@as we can tonight!
